The exploratory search is a new way to search the web, not to find what you are searching, but to find what you are not searching, and might be intersting for you !
Want a film recommendation related to writers you like? Interested by more complex and composite recommendations based on your deepest interests.
System gives you recommendations, but also tools to understand why you have these recommendations, because we know that the more important in a recommendation is to know why you get it !
